name: py-jsonpath-ng
description:
A final implementation of JSONPath for Python that aims to be standard
compliant, including arithmetic and binary comparison operators.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-ply
dependencies.description: PLY is nothing more than a straightforward lex/yacc implementation.

dependencies.name: py-decorator
dependencies.description:
The aim of the decorator module it to simplify the usage of decorators
for the average programmer, and to popularize decorators by showing
various non-trivial examples.

dependent_to.name: py-dvc
dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.
